## Quick Start Guide

1. **Fork** this repository
2. **Add yourself** to `game/players/YOUR_NAME.json`
3. **Submit a PR** to earn your first karma!

## Your First Player File

```json
{
  "name": "YOUR_GITHUB_USERNAME",
  "joined": "2026-01-18",
  "karma": 0,
  "achievements": [],
  "streak_days": 0
}
```

## What You Can Earn

| Action | Karma |
|--------|-------|
| First PR | +5 |
| Bug fix | +10 |
| New feature | +15 |
| Art contribution | +20 |
